Package org.jclouds.azure.management.features

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiskApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the disks in your subscription.
    DiskAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machines Disk in your subscription.
    HostedServiceApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the hosted services beneath your subscription.
    HostedServiceAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the hosted services beneath your subscription.
    LocationApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for listing the available data center locations for a hosted service in your subscription.
    LocationAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for listing the available data center locations for a hosted service in your subscription.
    OperationApi
    The Service Management API includes one operation for tracking the progress of asynchronous requests.
    OperationAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes one operation for tracking the progress of asynchronous requests.
    OSImageApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the OS images in your subscription.
    OSImageAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the OS images in your subscription.
    RoleApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machines in your subscription.
    RoleAsyncApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machines in your subscription.
